title: Ep 277: Accepting Change in Your Partner (Ft. Amir & Basirah )
itunes:title: Ep 277: Accepting Change in Your Partner (Ft. Amir & Basirah )
description:
This week the ladies are joined by a couple and podcast duo, Amir and Basirah of the “Both Sides of the Bed” Podcast. They begin by asking relationship questions to the couple and how they maintain their non-traditional monogam-ish relationship with one another. This week’s Vanilla we bring up a topic from Shan Boody’s podcast “Lovers & Friends” where a guest mentioned doing a sex act that she didn’t quite like to do. Is there anything you do for the pleasure of your partner even though you don’t enjoy it? We deep dive into that before discussing changes in your partner and how to navigate a relationship with the growth that comes with being human. From physical appearance to relationship dynamics, what happens when your partner changes?

Follow this week’s guests and subscribe to hear more from them on their podcast, “Both Sides of the Bed” wherever you listen to your favorite podcasts
Instagram Podcast: @bothsidesofthebed
Amir Instagram: @amir_rashad
Basirah Instagram: @basirah__

AUGUST 28TH in Brooklyn, NY! Catch us LIVE at the Black Effect Podcast Festival along with some of your favorite podcasts on the Black Effect Network on Iheart. Get your tickets at blackeffect.com/podcastfestival

Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages
Instagram @whoreible_decisions
Twitter @whoreiblepod

Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
Want more? Bonus episodes, merch and more Whoreible Decisions!! Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions
